statements: DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE trade_date = '2021-10-15' AND stock_price > 50.0;
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE id = 100 AND company_name = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE trade_date < '2022-01-01' AND stock_volume > 10000;
DELETE FROM StockTrends WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM FinancialData WHERE volume > 100000 AND closing_price < 50;
DELETE FROM model_parameters WHERE model_id = 2001 AND parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
DELETE FROM model_parameters WHERE model_id = 50 AND parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
DELETE FROM regression_models WHERE model_name = 'Linear Regression' AND model_version = 'v1.0';
